CIS 199.title: CIS 199: Software Development I
CIS 199.description: Introduction to object-oriented programming in C#. Produced console and form applications using concepts such as classes, methods, and inheritance.

CIS 200.title: CIS 199: Software Development II
CIS 200.description: Continuation of CIS 199. Produced more advanced console and form applications and included concepts like polymorphism and data structures.

CIS 411.title: CIS 411: Web Application Development
CIS 411.description: Introduction to dynamic web applications using the ASP.NET MVC pattern. This involved many technologies such as C#, HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

Independent React Projects.title: Independent React Projects
Independent React Projects.description: Non-university-related projects I completed while pursuing certifications on the Codecademy platform.
